question: Abhay Kumar Singh has been appointed as the Chairman & Managing Director of which Indian PSU?
option4: Power Grid Corporation of India Limited
explanation:
Abhay Kumar Singh has been recently appointed as the Chairman & Managing Director of the Indian PSU, NHPC Limited.
He has assumed the charge of Chairman and Managing Director of the company on February 24, 2020 and will serve till the date of his superannuation. Abhay Kumar has replaced Ratish Kumar who held additional charge of the post of Chairman & Managing Director.
